mapper.select: SELECT murq.uid , mcw.ml_id , murq.nm AS ml_nm , mcw.cl_uid , mc.nm AS cluster_nm , mcw.info AS api_json , (mrup.prom_pods) AS prompods_json , murq.request_json->'request' AS request_json , TO_CHAR(murq.request_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') request_dt , TO_CHAR(murq.noti_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') noti_dt , murp.info->'response' AS response_json FROM k_hybrid.mo_cluster_workload mcw INNER JOIN ( SELECT ml_id , jsonb_agg(results - 'mcontainerList') AS prom_pods FROM k_hybrid.mo_resource_usage_pod mrup WHERE mrup.last_at = 'Y' GROUP BY ml_id ) mrup ON mcw.ml_id LIKE mrup.ml_id || '%' INNER JOIN k_hybrid.mo_user_request murq ON murq.ml_id = mrup.ml_id INNER JOIN k_hybrid.mo_user_response murp ON murq.uid = murp.req_uid INNER JOIN k_hybrid.mo_cluster mc ON mc.uid = mcw.cl_uid WHERE 1 = 1 -- AND mcw.delete_at = 'N' AND mcw.ml_id = #{mlId}

SELECT murq.uid , mcw.ml_id , murq.nm AS ml_nm , mcw.cl_uid , mc.nm AS cluster_nm , mcw.info AS api_json , (mrup.prom_pods) AS prom_pods_json , murq.request_json->'request' AS request_json , TO_CHAR(murq.request_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') request_dt , TO_CHAR(murq.noti_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') noti_dt , murp.info->'response' AS response_json FROM k_hybrid.mo_cluster_workload mcw INNER JOIN ( SELECT ml_id , jsonb_agg(results - 'mcontainerList') AS prom_pods FROM k_hybrid.mo_resource_usage_pod mrup WHERE mrup.last_at = 'Y' GROUP BY ml_id ) mrup ON mcw.ml_id LIKE mrup.ml_id || '%' INNER JOIN k_hybrid.mo_user_request murq ON murq.ml_id = mrup.ml_id INNER JOIN k_hybrid.mo_user_response murp ON murq.uid = murp.req_uid INNER JOIN k_hybrid.mo_cluster mc ON mc.uid = mcw.cl_uid WHERE 1 = 1 -- AND mcw.delete_at = 'N' ORDER BY murq.request_dt desc
